Install
```````

1. Install python_ 2.6 or 2.7

2. Install pip_

3. Ensure pip is up-to-date::

     pip install --upgrade pip

4. Install x/84::

     pip install x84

5. Upgrading::

     pip install --upgrade x84

.. _python: https:/www.python.org/
.. _pip: http://guide.python-distribute.org/installation.html#installing-pip
